key.name: window-height
key.description: Stores the height of the main application window in pixels. This value is used to restore the window size when the application is restarted.

key.name: window-width
key.description: Stores the width of the main application window in pixels. This value is used to restore the window size when the application is restarted.

key.name: last-opened-page
key.description: Stores the identifier of the last page the user had open in the app (for example: 'home', 'albums', 'artists', or 'settings'). This allows restoring the same page when the app is restarted.

key.name: hide-library
key.description: If true, the library sidebar will be hidden in the UI.

key.name: queue-last-index
key.description: Stores the index of the last played item in the playback queue. This allows the player to resume playback from where it was left off. The index starts at 0 for the first item in the queue.

key.name: queue-last-songs
key.description: Contains the list of items currently in the playback queue. Each item is represented as a string, typically a file path or URL. This list is used to restore the queue after restarting the application.

key.name: queue-last-play-order
key.description: Contains the order in wich items in the queue will be played. Each item in the play order represents an index of a song in the queue

key.name: queue-shuffle
key.summary: Whether the playback is shuffled or not
key.description: Boolean value indicating whether shuffle mode is enabled for the playback queue. If true, items in the queue will be played in a random order instead of sequentially.

key.name: queue-loop
key.summary: Whether the current song is looped or not
key.description: Boolean value that determines if the currently playing item should repeat indefinitely. If true, the player will loop the current song until the user disables this option.

key.name: background-blur
key.description: If enabled, the application will apply a blur effect to the background behind main content areas. This can improve visual focus on the foreground content and create a modern, soft UI appearance. Disable this option to render the background without blur, which may improve performance on lower-end hardware.
